extDesc.message: Download Manager | Video Downloader | Bulk Image Downloader

tipBrowserAction.message: Download all resources on this page
tipBrowserAction.description: Tool-tip for the extension button (Chrono Sniffer) on Chrome's Tool-bar

titleSniffer.description: Title for Chrono Sniffer (resources sniffer/detector), please omit 'Chrono'

msgCannotScanResources.message: Cannot scan resources for this page.
msgCannotScanResources.description: Message shown in Chrono Sniffer, when it fails to scan resources for a webpage

labelCustomFilter.description: Custome Filter in Chrono Sniffer, which uses Regular Expression to construct a filter

titleQuickSelection.description: Title for the Quick Selection section in Chrono Sniffer

titleTaskProps.description: Title for the Task Properties section in Chrono Sniffer

optionShowSize.description: Option of showing file size for URLs in Chrono Sniffer

optionDisableExtFilters.description: Option in the Quick Selection section, which disables extension filters and applies custom filter exclusively

msgEmptyDownloadsList.description: Message shown in popup downloads list, when task list is empty

btnPopRemoveList.description: Option button for removing task in popup downloads list: only remove from list

btnPopRemoveFile.description: Option button for removing task in popup downloads list: remove from list and disk

optionDontAsk.description: Remember task removing option: remove from list or from disk

menuOpenManager.description: Menu item, click to open Download Manager page

menuGetHelp.description: Menu item, click to open Help page

menuReportIssue.description: Menu item, click to open Bug Tracking System

menuDLink.description: Context-menu item for links, '...' indicates New Task Dialog will show after clicking

menuDImage.description: Context-menu item for images, '...' indicates New Task Dialog will show after clicking

menuDVideo.description: Context-menu item for videos, '...' indicates New Task Dialog will show after clicking

menuDAudio.description: Context-menu item for audio, '...' indicates New Task Dialog will show after clicking

menuDLinkOneClick.description: Context-menu item for links, New Task Dialog won't show after clicking

menuDImageOneClick.description: Context-menu item for images, New Task Dialog won't show after clicking

menuDVideoOneClick.description: Context-menu item for videos, New Task Dialog won't show after clicking

menuDAudioOneClick.description: Context-menu item for audio, New Task Dialog won't show after clicking

unitBytes.description: how many bytes, plural form, $1 is a placeholder that will be replaced by a number, please leave it as is

unitSecond.description: how many second(s), singular form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitMinute.description: how many minute(s), singular form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitHour.description: how many hour(s), singular form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitDay.description: how many day(s), singular form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitSeconds.description: how many second(s), plural form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitMinutes.description: how many minute(s), plural form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitHours.description: how many hour(s), plural form, $1 will be replaced by a number

unitDays.description: how many day(s), plural form, $1 will be replaced by a number

fieldRemarks.description: Task property: any comments or extra information for the task

fieldRedirection.description: Task property: the final effective URL after redirections

fieldAddTime.description: Task property: the time when task was added

fieldElapsedTime.description: Task property: elapsed time since the task started

fieldRemainingTime.description: Task property: estimated time for download completion

fieldType.description: File type, a column of the URL table in Chrono Sniffer

optionTableAutoResize.description: Whether to adjust table columns' widths to make table as wide as screen, displayed as an option in column header's context-menu

optionTableSyncResize.description: Whether to resize column's content synchronously as column header is being resized, displayed as an option in column header's context-menu

optionSearchFuzzyMatch.description: Search option, whether to apply fuzzy matching

optionSearchCaseSensitive.description: Search option, whether to perform case-sensitive search

btnBackToManager.description: Top-left button on Options page, click to go back to Manager page

btnRate.description: Button: rate extension on Chrome web store

btnImportChromeHistory.description: Button: import downloads history from Chrome, shown on welcome screen after installation

btnClearFinished.description: Dropdown-menu item for clearing finished tasks

btnClearRemoved.description: Dropdown-menu item for clearing tasks with missing files

btnClearFailed.description: Dropdown-menu item for clearing failed tasks

btnClearAll.description: Dropdown-menu item for clearing all completed tasks and failed tasks

btnStart.description: Start button on New Task Dialog

btnStartAll.description: Start All button on the bottom of popup Chrono Sniffer

btnAddPaused.description: Add Paused button on New Task Dialog

optionAddTop.message: Add to front of the queue
optionAddTop.description: Whether to add new task to the front of the queue, displayed as an option on New Task Dialog

statusDownloadedSize.description: Downloaded file size of total file size, $1 and $2 will be replaced by file size,  e.g. 2.5MB of 10MB

statusTimeLeft.description: How much time remaining, $1 will be replaced by estimated time, e.g. 15 seconds left

statusSelectedOf.description: Status-bar message(on the bottom of Manager page): indicates how many tasks(rows) are being selected, $1 will be replaced by numbers, e.g. '15 items selected'

statusNumItems.description: Status-bar message: indicates the number of tasks in current view, $1 will be replaced by a number, e.g. '15 item(s)'

statusScheduledAutoClear.message: Automatic task clearing will run in $1 seconds
statusScheduledAutoClear.description: Status-bar message: informs user that automatic task clearing will start shortly, $1 will be replaced by a number

statusTasksCleared.description: Status-bar message: indicates the number of tasks that were successfully removed, $1 will be replaced by a number

statusNumDownloading.description: Status-bar message: indicates the number of downloading tasks, $1 will be replaced by a number, e.g. '5 downloading'

statusImporting.description: Status-bar message: importing downloads history from Chrome

statusCopyURL.description: Status-bar message: copying selected tasks' URLs

statusReadClipboard.description: Status-bar message: reading & analyzing contents of clipboard

extsAudio.description: File type, displayed as tab in Chrono Sniffer

ruleNew.description: Default caption for new rule in Rule System

tipOptSectionTaskDefaults.message: Default settings to be applied when adding new tasks, e.g. applied for one-click downloads

tipOptSectionOneClick.message: If enabled, download will start immediately when you click on a link, using default task settings (see above), without prompting a dialog for setting Naming Mask etc. Note that Chrome's Save As dialog may still show up, click on the tip to see how to disable it.

optSectionPopup.description: Title for Options section: popup window

optSectionPreview.description: Title for file preview in the preview panel of main UI

optItemDefAddPaused.description: Start right away or add paused, default option for adding new task

optOptionUniquify.description: Filename conflict action: make filename unique

optOptionOverwrite.description: Filename conflict action: overwrite existing file

optOptionPrompt.description: Filename conflict action: prompt Save As dialog

optOptionSkipPause.description: Filename conflict action: skip and pause the task

optOptionSkipCancel.description: Filename conflict action: skip and cancel the task

optItemDownloadClipboard.description: Options item: fill the textbox in New Task Dialog with URL from clipboard

optItemStartInterrupted.message: Start button can start failed tasks

optItemOverrideChrome.message: Override Chrome's original downloads page and enable $1 keyboard shortcut
optItemOverrideChrome.description: Options item, $1 will be replaced by the actual shortcut, e.g 'Ctrl+J', please leave it unchanged

optItemHideShelf.description: Options item: hide Chrome's downloads status bar on the bottom of browser window

optItemSlideDetailsPanel.message: Slide in Details Panel when clicking on task

optItemRecycleCancel.message: Cancel the task when it's moved to trash

optItemClearSearch.message: Clear search box when filter changes
optItemClearSearch.description: Options item: exit searching when left panel task filter changes

optItemMenuDialog.description: Options item: enable context-menu items for links/images/audios/videos, see menuDLink, menuDImage, menuDAudio, menuDVideo

optItemMenuOneClick.description: Options item: enable context-menu items(one-click version) for links/images/audios/videos, see menuDLinkOneClick, menuDImageOneClick, menuDAudioOneClick, menuDVideoOneClick

optItemNotifyOneClick.message: Show notification when adding one-click download

optItemNotifyLargePreview.description: Options item: use large preview size for images in notifications

optItemBadgeDownloadNum.message: Show number of downloading tasks over toolbar icon

optItemConcurrentDownloads.description: Options item: maximum number of concurrent downloads

optItemDownloadsPerServer.description: Options item: maximum connections from same server

optItemPopDeleteAction.description: Options item: action after clicking the 'Delete' button in popup downloads list

optOptionRemList.description: Action after clicking the 'Delete' button: remove from downloads list

optOptionRemFile.description: Action after clicking the 'Delete' button: remove from downloads list and also remove the file

optOptionRemAsk.description: Action after clicking the 'Delete' button: ask user

optItemPopMaxItems.description: Options item: maximum items to show in popup downloads list

optItemPopShowDLFirst.description: Options item: show downloading tasks first in the popup downloads list

optItemPopClearClose.description: Options item: close popup downloads list

optItemPopLikeButtons.description: Options item: show social media buttons, e.g. facebook like button

optItemPreviewAutoplay.description: Options item: whether to autoplay audio/video in file preview

optItemRuleMatchMode.description: Options item: how to match rules

optOptionFirstMatch.description: Rule matching mode: use first matched rule

optOptionReplace.description: Rule matching mode: latter matched rule overwrites previous ones

optItemClearRemoveFile.description: Checkbox option shown on Clear Tasks dropdown-menu, whether to remove files as tasks are cleared

tipExtFilterEnable.message: Enabled as extensions filter in Chrono Sniffer
tipExtFilterEnable.description: Tool-tip for column header in Options>Extension Filter table, explaining what corresponding column means

headExtFilterCaption.description: Column header name in Options>Extension Filter table: caption of the filter for displaying

headExtFilterRefName.description: Column header name in Options>Extension Filter table: internal name for referencing filter in other expressions

tipExtFilterRefName.message: Internal name for referencing filter in other expressions
tipExtFilterRefName.description: Tool-tip for column header in Options>Extension Filter table

headExtFilterExts.description: Column header name in Options>Extension Filter table: file extensions expression

helpExtFilter.message:
* Double-click to edit.
* Type on empty row to add a new filter.
* Select rows and press DELETE to remove them.
helpExtFilter.description: Brief help shown under Options>Extension Filter table, please separate lines when necessary

headRulesActive.description: Column header name in Options>Rule System table: whether to activate the rule

tipRulesActive.message: Only active Rules will be used for Rule matching
tipRulesActive.description: Tool-tip for column header in Options>Rule System table, explaining what corresponding column means

headRulesAsFilter.description: Column header name in Options>Rule System table: whether to use the rule as task filter in Manager

tipRulesAsFilter.message: Show as tasks filter in Download Manager
tipRulesAsFilter.description: Tool-tip for column header in Options>Rule System table

headRulesCaption.description: Column header name in Options>Rule System table: caption of the rule for displaying

headRulesRefName.description: Column header name in Options>Rule System table: internal name for referencing the rule in other expressions

tipRulesRefName.message: Internal name for referencing rule in other expressions
tipRulesRefName.description: Tool-tip for column header in Options>Rule System table

headRulesCondition.description: Column header name in Options>Rule System table: rule condition expression

helpRules.message:
* Double-click to edit.
* Type on empty row to add a new rule.
* Select rows and press DELETE to remove them.
* If you have problems in writing the Rules, please refer to the Help section.
helpRules.description: Brief help shown under Options>Rule System table, please separate lines when necessary

tipOptItemSlideDetailsPanel.message: You can still Alt+click a task to open Details Panel

tipOptItemRuleMatchMode.message: Please note that only active Rules are tested for matching. In the Replace mode, all matched Rules are applied, but latter Rules will overwrite former ones.

tipOptNoRuleMatch.description: Tips explaining when the default naming mask and default folder will be used, as set in Rule System

tipURL.message: You can enter multiple URLs separated by new lines; you can start batch downloads by using the Batch Descriptors.
tipURL.description: Tips on entering URLs in New Task Dialog

tipNaming.message: Please refer to Help page for usage of naming masks.
tipNaming.description: Tips on naming mask in New Task Dialog

titleSwitchUI.description: Tool-tip for UI-mode switching button: list or table

labelBGImageURL.description: Set background image by file URL

tipBGEnable.message: This feature is experimental. Due to certain issue of Chrome, enabling background may increase memory usage dramatically.
tipBGEnable.description: Informing users about the risk of enabling background feature

tipBGURLHasFileAccess.message: Enter a web URL, or full path of an image on your computer prefixed with 'file:///'
tipBGURLHasFileAccess.description: Explaining how to set background image by file URL

tipBGURLNoFileAccess.message: Enter a web URL, or full path of an image on your computer (for local file, you need to enable file access for Chrono first, click the question mark to see how)
tipBGURLNoFileAccess.description: Explaining how to set background image by file URL, in the case that Chrono hasn't got file access permission

tipBGBlur.message: Blurring effect may decrease GUI responsiveness
tipBGBlur.description: Informing users the downside of enabling background blurring

tipAutoClear.message: Automatically clear tasks from the list, but keep files on disk

labelAutoClear.description: schedule clearing tasks, either 'schedule' or 'automatically' can be used here

confirmClearTask.message: Are you sure you want to remove $1 items?
confirmClearTask.description: Confirm removing tasks from Chrono after user clicks on `Clear` menu, $1 will be replaced with a number

confirmRecycleRunning.description: Confirm recycling tasks that are currently running

confirmBtnYesFile.description: Remove tasks from list as well as files from disk

confirmBatchDownload.message: It seems that you're going to start batch downloads, here are some examples:

confirmBatchDownloadNaming.message: For batch download, please make sure naming mask generate different filenames. Proceed anyway?

confirmCantResumeRestart.message: Task $1 fails to resume, restart it?
confirmCantResumeRestart.description: $1 will be replaced by name of task

confirmReset.message: Operation cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
confirmReset.description: Confirmation message shown after clicking panic button

msgTextWelcome.message:
Before you start, please take these two extra steps to ensure better experience with Chrono.
1. Turn off Chrome's Save As dialog so that you won't be asked where to save file for every download. This can be done by clearing the checkbox before $1.
2. Allow Chrono to access file URLs for fast file preview, by ticking the checkbox $2 on $3.
If you have any question, please visit our Help page and FAQ page.
msgTextWelcome.description:
Welcome message, 
 are used to separate lines, $1 and $2 will be replaced by the labels of checkbox, $3 will be replaced by the link to Chrome Extensions page, please leave all of them unchanged.

msgUpdated.description: Update message, $1 will be replaced by translation of 'Chrono Download Manager', please leave it unchanged

msgTitleUpdateAvail.description: Update available message, $1 will be replaced by version number

msgTextUpdateAvail.message: Please reload extension to apply the update.

btnUpdateReload.description: Click to reload extension and apply update

msgTaskStart.description: Notification: task added to queue, ready to start

msgTaskAddPaused.description: Notification: task added and paused, wait to start

msgSingleDownloadCanceledFilenameConflic.message: Download $1 was canceled due to filename conflict.
msgSingleDownloadCanceledFilenameConflic.description: $1 will be replaced by the filename

msgMultiDownloadsCanceledFilenameConflic.message: $1 downloads were canceled due to filename conflict.
msgMultiDownloadsCanceledFilenameConflic.description: $1 will be replaced by a number

msgSelectTaskInfo.message: Select a task to see its details.
msgSelectTaskInfo.description: In the details panel, this message shows up if no task is selected

msgPreviewFailed.description: Error message in file preview panel

msgPreviewLargeFile.message: It may take a while to load the preview.
msgPreviewLargeFile.description: Warning message in file preview panel

msgPreviewFileAccess.message: Cannot load local file for preview, you can turn on this feature by checking the checkbox $1 under $2 on chrome://extensions page.
msgPreviewFileAccess.description: Error message for preview failure due to the lack of file access permission; $1 will be replaced by the translated text of 'Allow access to file URLs', and $2 will be replaced by the translated text of 'Chrono Download Manager', please leave them unchanged

msgPreviewPdfViewer.message: Chrome PDF Viewer is required for the preview, please configure it in chrome://settings.
msgPreviewPdfViewer.description: Error message for PDF file preview failure; instructions will follow after this message

titleTips.description: Title for tips boxes, which show some useful tips of using the Download Manager

tipmsgDoubleClick.message: Double-click action can be changed under $1
tipmsgDoubleClick.description: Tips on changing action for double-clicking on task, $1 will be replaced by corresponding Options section

tipmsgNotifications.message: Notification and sound settings can be changed under $1
tipmsgNotifications.description: Tips on configuring notifications, $1 will be replaced by corresponding Options section

tipmsgSlideDetailsPanel.message: The sliding details panel can be turned off under $1
tipmsgSlideDetailsPanel.description: Tips on disabling the auto-slide details panel, $1 will be replaced by corresponding Options section

tipmsgTaskFilter.message: Drag to reorder Task Filters; you can also add custom Task Filters under $1
tipmsgTaskFilter.description: Tips on using Task Filters, $1 will be replaced by corresponding Options section

tipmsgOpenShortcut.message: You can open $1 with keyboard shortcut $2
tipmsgOpenShortcut.description: Tips on using keyboard shortcut. $1 will replaced by the translated text of 'Chrono Download Manager', and $2 will be replaced by the actual shortcut, e.g 'Ctrl+J', please leave them unchanged

tipmsgGridSelection.message: Hold Ctrl/Shift to select multiple rows, or press $1 to select all rows
tipmsgGridSelection.description: Tips on quick selection in task manager. $1 will be replaced by the actual shortcut, e.g 'Ctrl+A', please leave it unchanged

tipmsgCopySelectedURLs.message: Simply press $1 to copy URLs of selected task(s)
tipmsgCopySelectedURLs.description: Tips on copying selected tasks' URLs in task manager. $1 will be replaced by the actual shortcut, e.g 'Ctrl+C', please leave it unchanged

tipmsgFitColumnWidth.message: Double-click on the column resizer to adjust column width automatically
tipmsgFitColumnWidth.description: Tips on fitting column width regarding its contents

btnGotIt.description: Button shown under tip message, 'I got it, don't show again'

btnTakeMeThere.description: Button shown under tip message, click to open corresponding Options section and change settings

msgRateShare.message: If you find $1 useful, please give us a Five Star review on $2 and share with your friends!
msgRateShare.description: $1 will be replaced by translation of 'Chrono Download Manager', $2 will be replaced by translation of 'Chrome Web Store', please leave them unchanged

btnShareDone.description: Button on the Rate/Share box, already rated or shared

phraseAutomatic.description: Word/Phrase: automatic naming mask, i.e. determine naming mask automatically from rules

phraseMultiValues.description: Word/Phrase: when displaying a property with different values for multiple tasks

phraseRegex.description: Word/Phrase: regular expression for custom filter

phraseUnknownSize.description: Message shown for tasks with unknown file size

errorNoID.message: Fail to add new task to Chrono because there are too many tasks in the manager, clean up some unused tasks and try again.

errorFNameConflict.description: Error message, preferably no period here

errorFileNotExist.description: Fail to open file because it does not exist

errorRemovedFromChrome.message: The task may have been removed from Chrome.
errorRemovedFromChrome.description: Fail to open file/folder, the task may have been removed in chrome://downloads

errorInvalidNamingMask.description: User provided naming mask is invalid

chromesysDownloadSaveAsPrompt.message: Ask where to save each file before downloading

msgChromeI18nLanguage.message: Chrono uses the same language as your Chrome browser.
